name: Sisig (Sweet and Sour Pig's Ears)
author: Emelita
summary: This Filipino dish of pig's ears in a spicy, sweet and sour sauce is a perfect appetizer when people are drinking beer. [Originally submitted to Allrecipes.asia]
ingredients: 2 ¼ pounds pig's ears, cut into thin slices
1  green bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1  red bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1 large green chile pepper, seeded and sliced
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil; boil pig's ears until no longer pink, about 10 minutes
Combine 3/4 cup water, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Add the pig's ears and mix together
Cover with plastic wrap and keep refrigerated
Serve with green bell pepper, red bell pepper, and green chile
